$description:
| What does this do? | Ensure 'external access' is restricted in the Teams admin center. |
| Why should you use this? | Allowing users to communicate with Skype or Teams users outside of an organization presents a potential security threat.  This reduces the risk of data loss, phishing, and social engineering attacks against organization users via Teams. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will be limited to an organizationally approved list of external Teams recipients. |
| Learn more | [Limit domains for external access](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/defender-office-365/step-by-step-guides/reducing-attack-surface-in-microsoft-teams?view=o365-worldwide#limit-domains-for-external-access) |
